meanings.definition: Lacking enthusiasm or interest; showing a lack of effort or commitment.
meanings.sent1: She gave a halfhearted attempt at solving the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: His halfhearted response to the invitation disappointed his friends.
meanings.sent3: The team's halfhearted practice made their coach shake his head.
meanings.sent4: Her halfhearted apology did little to mend the broken friendship.
meanings.sent5: The halfhearted applause echoed through the empty auditorium.

meanings.sent1: The presentation received only halfhearted applause.
meanings.sent2: He made a halfhearted attempt to clean his room before giving up.
meanings.sent3: The halfhearted dance moves made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The halfhearted sales pitch failed to convince any customers.
meanings.sent5: The halfhearted singing lacked emotion and passion.
